name: Seed Boy
description:
Seed Boy is a short platformer created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 34. It combines the themes of "Two Button Controls" and "Growing".

In Seed Boy, you play as an animate Acorn who runs all around planting trees and flowers. Seed Boy is controlled using only two buttons meaning that timing is the most crucial element of the platforming.

Sounds were provided by ismfilms.com and all other assets and code are original and created by Christopher "FoxWasp" Bly.
